channel.title: Less is better: Finally an interesting 3D desktop prototype

item.title: Finally an interesting 3D desktop prototype
item.description: My desk contains piles of stuff. Your desk probably contains piles of stuff too. See how an innovative user interface takes advantage of our tendancy to organize small to medium amounts of data in piles.
item.author: jlam@iunknown.com (John Lam)

item.title: "Finally an interesting 3D desktop prototype" by Dan S.
item.description: The rap summary was hilarious as well!

item.title: "Finally an interesting 3D desktop prototype" by Jeff
item.description:
Quite cool. Now if they could just remove 80% of it :-)

Interesting possibilites enter my mind if I could manipulate the desktop of a Tablet PC this way. I think this demo shows the potential to take pen input devices to the next level.

Thanks for the link.
